title: Chicken brochettes with pitta
ingredients: ['4 chicken breast fillets, about 150g each', '1 large green pepper, seeded', '1 tbsp olive oil', 'juice of 1 lemon', '4 pitta breads', '50g soft cheese with herbs and garlic', '4 crisp lettuce leaves', '2 tomatoes, sliced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
